thread.title: Wayne Rooney among fastest in the world according to shock study, but no Mane or Sanchez
thread.title_full: Wayne Rooney among fastest in the world according to shock study, but no Mane or Sanchez

title: Wayne Rooney among fastest in the world according to shock study, but no Mane or Sanchez
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Wayne Rooney among fastest in the world according to shock study, but no Mane or Sanchez WAYNE ROONEY has surprisingly been named among the top 10 fastest players in the world over the last year, according to a study conducted by Mexican club C.F Pachuca. PUBLISHED: 09:31, Wed, Feb 15, 2017 | UPDATED: 10:02, Wed, Feb 15, 2017 Fastest footballers in the world: Wayne Rooney among top 10 in shocking study Wed, February 15, 2017 Manchester United ace Wayne Rooney has been named the 10th fastest footballer in the world, according to a study conducted by Mexican club C.F Pachuca Getty Images 1 of 11 There is no room for Sadio Mane or Alexis Sanchez in the top 10 fastest players 
The Manchester United hero was clocked at a top speed of 31.2 km/h during the past year by C.F Pachuca's study, earning him a place among the top 10 quickest players in the world. 
However, the results seem a little odd with no spot on the list for Premier League speedsters such as Hector Bellerin, Alexis Sanchez, Sadio Mane, Raheem Sterling or Shane Long. 
Borussia Dortmund flier Marco Reus also fails to make the cut while Atletico Bilbao's Inaki Williams, reportedly La Liga's fastest player , is nowhere to be seen. 
Scroll through the gallery above to see the top 10 fastest players in the world, according to C.F Pachuca's study. Related articles
